summary:
German linguist and translator with broad experience leading class and individual training and writing courses across various international organizations 

•	Proven track record in developing and conducting language instruction curriculum and certification motivating learners to successfully achieve requirements 
•	Results-driven instructor of multicultural, cross-functional groups adhering to rigorous examination criteria
•	Keen ability to blend different learning styles together to improve language proficiency outcomes;  BKE (Basiskwalificatie Examinering) and BKO (Basiskwalificatie Onderwijs) accreditations and unique certification in specialize “Super-Learning” technique
•	Experienced translator and content advisor across various industry sectors
